original_title: Above & Beyond: Acoustic - Live at the Hollywood Bowl
overview: In 2016, Above & Beyond left the electronic music world behind, embarking on an ambitious 'acoustic' world tour that culminated at the Hollywood Bowl, Los Angeles. In front of a sold out crowd and accompanied by a 34-piece orchestra, Above & Beyond showcased two hours of songs from their much-loved archive, completely reimagined for one of the world's most famous stages.
title: Above & Beyond: Acoustic - Live at the Hollywood Bowl
